description: Let the slow cooker do all the hard work for you, and up your veg quota at the same time, with this warming cheesy cauliflower and spinach soup.
keywords: Slow Cooker Cheesy Cauliflower & Spinach Soup
name: Slow Cooker Cheesy Cauliflower & Spinach Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups Woolworths shredded light tasty cheese
6 1cm-thick slices sourdough ancient grains & sprouted seeds miche

recipeInstructions.text: Ladle soup into bowls. Dollop a little yoghurt into each bowl, then swirl over top. Top with remaining spinach and sprinkle with dukkah. Drizzle with oil, then serve with bread.
